addExtension(((string,string,address),(b.details: Adds a new extension to the router.

getAllFunctionsOfExtension(string).details: Returns all functions that belong to the given extension contract.

getExtension(string).details: Returns the extension metadata and functions for a given extension.

getExtensionForFunction(bytes4).details: Returns the extension metadata for a given function.

getExtensionImplementation(string).details: Returns the extension's implementation smart contract address.

removeExtension(((string,string,address).details: Removes an existing extension from the router.

updateExtension(((string,string,address).details: Updates an existing extension in the router, or overrides a default extension.

documentation.text: @dev Adds a new extension to the router.
@dev Updates an existing extension in the router, or overrides a default extension.
@dev Removes an existing extension from the router.
